subject: vam modules and software
description_text:
Hi
I received delivery of my Vam Modules and have them installed but i cannot get the game to connect to your software.
Can you help me please
Regards Andrew

conversations.body_text: Hi Andy Lawrence,  Our software currently supports 10 games. May I ask which game you are using now? We are continuously working to add telemetry support for more titles. In the meantime, you can use the internal version of SimHub that I’ve provided. The official release is still undergoing testing and may take a bit more time.      https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QrSbAvCC5iyx9XgdRgSQV-hWpmDGkujc/view?usp=sharing
